sentences.en: The child tailed his kite.
sentences.cn: 小孩儿给自己的风筝装了尾巴。

sentences.en: He tried to fly his kite.
sentences.cn: 他试图放飞他的风筝。

phrases.cn: v. 放风筝；开空头支票；试探舆论
放风筝；开空头支票；签发通融票据以资弥补

sentences.en: Go for a walk, fly a kite and visit the zoo.
sentences.cn: 散散步，放放风筝，逛逛动物园。

sentences.en: Almost as if the inner child in us wants to put the rest of the world on hold and just run outside to climb a tree or fly a kite.
sentences.cn: 仿佛我们内心的童真想要撂下整个世界，就只是跑出去爬爬树，或者放放风筝。

sentences.en: India was named best place to fly a kite as the pastime is a daily activity for many Indians.
sentences.cn: 在印度，放风筝是很多印度人日常生活消遣的活动，所以被评为最适合放风筝的国家。

sentences.en: This is the highest mountain in Japan.
sentences.cn: 这是日本最高的山。

sentences.en: The camp was surrounded by a high fence.
sentences.cn: 营地四周围着高高的栅栏。

sentences.en: a ten-foot high statue
sentences.cn: 10英尺高的雕像

sentences.en: high school students
sentences.cn: 高中生

sentences.en: high school graduates
sentences.cn: 高中毕业生

sentences.en: They moved to a new house some time ago (=  a fairly long time ago  ) .
sentences.cn: 他们搬进新居已有些日子了。

sentences.en: We had our bicentenary celebrations not that long ago.
sentences.cn: 不久前，我们举行了200周年庆典活动。

sentences.en: Burma borders on India.
sentences.cn: 缅甸与印度毗邻。

sentences.en: This book treats of the caste system in India.
sentences.cn: 这本书论述了印度的种姓制度。

sentences.en: If you come to India for just one thing, this should be it.
sentences.cn: 如果你只为一件事来到印度，那就到这儿来吧。

phrases.cn: 东印度（指印度，印度支那半岛，马来半岛和马来群岛等）

sentences.en: We looked for a flat spot where we could pitch our tent (= put up our tent ) .
sentences.cn: 我们寻找一个平缓的地方搭帐篷。

phrases.cn: 大帐篷政策（包容各种不同的政治和社会观点）
帐篷城（搭有很多帐篷的社群的别称）

sentences.en: the craters on the surface of the moon
sentences.cn: 月球表面的环形山

sentences.en: The Americans landed on the Moon in 1969.
sentences.cn: 美国人于1969年登上月球。

sentences.en: The moon appeared from behind a cloud.
sentences.cn: 月亮从云后钻了出来。

sentences.en: The man had a look of surprise on his face.
sentences.cn: 那人脸上一副惊讶的表情。

sentences.en: We'll solve the case ourselves and surprise everyone.
sentences.cn: 我们将自己解决这件事，并让所有人吃惊。

sentences.en: If she comes, she will get a surprise.
sentences.cn: 如果她来，她会大吃一惊。

sentences.en: A snake slithered across our path.
sentences.cn: 一条蛇蜿蜒爬过我们的小路。

sentences.en: At first, he was really scared.
sentences.cn: 刚开始时他非常害怕。

phrases.cn: 吓得要死；被吓死；害怕得要命

sentences.en: Please keep the doors closed while the train is moving.
sentences.cn: 火车行驶时请保持车门关闭。

sentences.en: ‘Come on,’ Sue said. No one moved.
sentences.cn: “来吧。”休说。但没有人动。

sentences.en: Could you move your car, please? It’s blocking the road.
sentences.cn: 你能把车挪一下吗？挡着路了。

phrases.cn: 在活动中，在进行中；四处奔波

sentences.en: There’s so much to do. I don’t know where to start.
sentences.cn: 有那么多的事情要做，我都不知道从哪里开始。

sentences.en: Have you started your homework?
sentences.cn: 你开始做家庭作业了吗？

sentences.en: I’d better get started (= start doing something ) soon.
sentences.cn: 我最好马上就开始。

phrases.cn: [美国口语] 制造麻烦；引起争吵(或打斗)

sentences.en: The cats jumped down and came to meet us.
sentences.cn: 这些猫跳下来，过来迎接我们。

sentences.en: The escalator wafts us up and down every day.
sentences.cn: 自动扶梯天天送我们上上下下。

sentences.en: What you do is squat up and down really fast.
sentences.cn: 你 所要做的就是真正快速地上下蹲坐。

sentences.en: When she woke, the sun was streaming through the windows.
sentences.cn: 她醒来时，阳光泻入窗内。

sentences.en: Try not to wake the baby.
sentences.cn: 尽量不要吵醒宝宝。

phrases.cn: 醒来，起床；开始警觉；开始了解真相
紧紧跟随；随着…而来；作为…的结果；仿效

sentences.en: Come into the office.
sentences.cn: 到办公室里来。

sentences.en: He thrust his hand into his coat pocket.
sentences.cn: 他把手插进大衣口袋里。

sentences.en: There must be another way into the cave.
sentences.cn: 一定有其他的路可以进入洞穴。

sentences.en: a tropical forest
sentences.cn: 热带森林

sentences.en: the danger of forest fires
sentences.cn: 发生森林火灾的危险

phrases.cn: 森林火灾；森林大火；山火

sentences.en: She tucked her hair behind her ears.
sentences.cn: 她把头发拢到耳朵背后。
